main: Standard {status:Charge} build up (+1 Potency every 10 Count consumed, Potency increases damage dealt).
Generates {status:Charge} Count on S1 and S2 and consumes it on S3. S2 consumes some but it's always a net gain.

S3 gets Indiscriminate, {status:WideAreaRampage}, and +1 atk weight at 5-9 (status:Charge) Count, making it hit randomly between the main target and another random target (either an ally or enemy). At 3+ Potency, it loses Indiscriminate, so it will only target enemies.
Her passive doubles her {status:Sinking} application against targets without {status:Sinking}.
other: She can gain {status:Sinking} from losing clashes, triggering the downside of her S2 or S3 (not enough {status:Charge}), or when triggering her passive. She doesn't do anything with it, so it's purely a downside. Be careful of the stack building up especially if she never gets hit because {status:Sinking} doesn't decay naturally.

1091401.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count in this Encounter

When using a Base Attack Skill that inflicts [Sinking] Potency, if the main target does not have [Sinking], this unit gains 5 [Sinking] and doubles the amount of [Sinking] Potency the Skill applies (once per turn; in Focused Encounters, the Part)
1091401.name: Jolly Antlers

1091411.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count in this Encounter

When using a Base Attack Skill that inflicts [Sinking] Potency, if the main target does not have [Sinking], this unit gains 5 [Sinking] and doubles the amount of [Sinking] Potency the Skill applies (once per turn; in Focused Encounters, the Part)

At less than 35% HP, Base Attack Skills gain Final Power +1
1091411.name: Jolly Antlers

1091421.desc: 1 ally with the lowest SP: Skills that consume [Charge] or Unique Charge[TabExplain] and have effects that inflict [Sinking] against enemies deal +10% damage (except E.G.O Skills)
1091421.name: Carol of Dying Comrades

data.desc:
Deal +5% damage for every [Charge] (max 20%)
[WhenUse] At 5~9 [Charge] Count:
- Gain 5 [Sinking] and +5 [Charge] Count
- This Skill gains the following attributes: [CantIdentify], [WideAreaRampage], and Atk Weight +1
- [BeforeUse] At 3+ [Charge], this Skill does not gain the [CantIdentify] effect
[WhenUse] At 10+ [Charge] Count, consume all [Charge] Count to gain the following effects:
- Coin Power +1
- Deal +6% damage for every 1 excess [Charge] Count consumed past 10 (max 30%)
